value:
$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Yeesh! Are you all right, Reginn?!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm still in one piece...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Keep your head on a swivel! If you
don't, you're going to die out here!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I know, I know! But—$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Normal,Face|Grrrraaahhhh...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Brother, listen to me!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Reginn! Watch out!$k$p$EFace_Cool|Hngh— Rrr!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Dagr! No!$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo500,255,0,0,150|$Fi500|$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Dagr!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$EFace_Pain|...Huh?$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Hrgh! *cough*$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|S-Sis!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no... Alfonse, Princess Nótt, she—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Sharena, we need to get Fáfnir
away from Princess Nótt!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Right.$k$pHang in there, Princess Nótt...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Normal,Face|Krrraaahhh!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|*cough*$k$pWhat are you...looking at, Dagr?$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06B,0|$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Cool|An empty-headed— Why did you
get in my way?!$k$pWhy do you always have to ruin
everything all the time?!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That's...all you have to say?$k$pI had hoped...as my sister...you'd
at least have the sense...to thank
me... *cough*$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I love not having sense! And I love
that you swoon over...whatever it is
you see in the men you fall for!$k$pAnd you know I would get you
the throne!$k$pJust...don't die! I don't know what
I'd do without you...$k$p$EFace_Cry|I need you, Sis!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Cool|...Heh. Sorry, Dagr, but I think...it's
time for me to go...and for you to
find your own way...$k$pFind a way...to be a great queen...$k$p$EFace_Smile|I'm sure you will...be splendid.$k$pYou are...my sister, after all...$k$p...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Sis?$k$pNótt! No! Don't leave me!
Don't leave me alone!$k$p$EFace_Cry|No, no, no, no...$k$p*sob*$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$w0|

$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|N-no... Princess Nótt... I-I...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Princess Reginn! We need to focus!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|But because of me, she...she's...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|No! This is a battlefield. We're all
a hair's breadth from death at any
given moment here.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Anger|He's right, Reginn.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|D-Dagr! Are you serious?!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I chose for myself to follow and
protect you—just like my sister
chose to protect me...$k$pThis is not your fault. We made
these choices ourselves.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Dagr, I'm...I'm so sorry!$k$pI don't know what to say!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You don't need to say anything.$k$pBut if you want to know what you
can DO, I have only one answer
for you: defeat Fáfnir.$k$pTake him down yourself.
It's how it has to be.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Dagr...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You understand, don't you?$k$pAll of us here—my sister and I, all the
people in Askr, and all the people in
Niðavellir too—we need you.$k$pWe need you to set things right.
For all of us.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...I understand.$k$pI will defeat him... I will!$k$pI'm sorry, Fáfnir, Brother, but...$k$p$EFace_Anger|I have to stop you!$k$p$Sbs150|
